Hi [~chenfsd] & [~vrushalic],
We can group related issues under one jira and raise it. IMHO for less than 2kb patches, 2 jiras are not required for logging. Can we merge them in YARN-5511 or vice versa ?

Hi [~vrushalic] and [~Naganarasimha], 

Thanks for looking into this. How about we change YARN-5507 into a general log refactoring/improvement suggestions in YARN (similar as HDFS-10752) and merge YARN-5508 and YARN-5511 under this?

+1 for merging as [~Naganarasimha] suggested. 
[~chenfsd] please go ahead and merge the yarn jiras, I can put up a combined patch then.

Hi [~vrushalic] and [~Naganarasimha], 

I already set the YARN-5507 to supercede YARN-5508 and YARN-5511. Feel free to combine patches.
Cancelling the patching, as focus is enlarged with YARN-5508 and YARN-5511
